text: Mauro Daniel Fernández Sayes (born 11 August 1997) is a Uruguayan footballer who plays as a defender for Juventud de Las Piedras in the Uruguayan Primera División. ==References== ==External links== *Profile at World Football Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Juventud de Las Piedras players Category:Uruguayan Primera División players Category:Uruguayan Segunda División players Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:People from Colonia Department
title: Mauro Fernández Sayes
